attributes.action: Make the A605 between the A1 at Peterborough and the A14 a dual carriageway with a central reservation to save lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A605 between the A1 at Peterborough and the A14 is one of the most dangerous stretches of road in the UK. Regular users will know that the section to the east of the Elton turn off, up the hill, regularly sees horrendous fatalities. As a major route for heavy vehicles and other motorists alike please make the entire stretch between the A1 and the A14 dual cariage way with most importantly, a central barrier.
